alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 02 at 2:27PM CST until January 04 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Today, west winds 35 to 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. Tuesday, west winds 45 to 65 mph with gusts up to 85 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains
